description:
Your surprise rainfall hero. This jacket is a life saver with a 2.5 layer construction that’s fully waterproof – perfect for sudden downpours that the weather channel failed to predict. It folds down to an inconspicuous size that stows away in your jersey pocket.

  • Made of 2.5-layer Deluge Light fabric that's completely waterproof and moderately breathable
  • Fabric has a hint of stretch for great fit in the ride position
  • Sealed seams and waterproof front zip keep rain from sneaking in
  • Innovative "gutters" direct water away from the cuffs and off the back
  • Folds down small to fit inside your jersey pocket
  • Back vent helps keep you from overheating
  • 360° reflective details keep you seen
  • Trim, athletic fit; if you want to wear this over work clothes on your commute, Castelli recommends going up a size
  • Castelli recommends this jacket for 6°-18°C temperatures
name: Castelli Emergency 2 Rain Jacket - Men's
